name: Survival Run with Bear Grylls
summary: a free-to-play action game that puts you in control of celebrity survivalist Bear Grylls. This running game tasks you with overcoming diverse terrain, from running through forests to boating across clear waters. This takes the running subgenre to the next level, with activities such as driving boats and going skydiving.
